description: Pityrosporum Folliculitis is a common skin condition caused by an overgrowth of yeast in hair follicles. It often presents as small, itchy bumps on the skin, particularly on the chest, back, and shoulders.
possible causes: Overgrowth of yeast (Pityrosporum) on the skin
symptoms: Itchy red bumps on the skin
treatments: Keeping the affected area clean and dry
Avoiding tight clothing and excessive sweating
